Uses of Package
org.openhab.core.automation.handler

  • Packages that use org.openhab.core.automation.handler 
    Package Description
    org.openhab.core.automation.handler  
    org.openhab.core.automation.module.script.rulesupport.shared.factories  
    org.openhab.core.automation.module.script.rulesupport.shared.simple  
    org.openhab.core.automation.thingsupport  
  • Classes in org.openhab.core.automation.handler used by org.openhab.core.automation.handler 
    Class Description
    ActionHandler
    This interface should be implemented by external modules which provide functionality for processing Action modules.
    BaseModuleHandler
    This is a base class that can be used by any ModuleHandler implementation
    ConditionHandler
    This interface provides common functionality for processing Condition modules.
    ModuleHandler
    A common interface for all module Handler interfaces.
    ModuleHandlerFactory
    This interface represents a factory for ModuleHandler instances.
    TriggerHandler
    This Handler interface is used by the RuleManager to set a callback interface to itself.
  • Classes in org.openhab.core.automation.handler used by org.openhab.core.automation.module.script.rulesupport.shared.factories 
    Class Description
    ActionHandler
    This interface should be implemented by external modules which provide functionality for processing Action modules.
    ConditionHandler
    This interface provides common functionality for processing Condition modules.
    TriggerHandler
    This Handler interface is used by the RuleManager to set a callback interface to itself.
  • Classes in org.openhab.core.automation.handler used by org.openhab.core.automation.module.script.rulesupport.shared.simple 
    Class Description
    TriggerHandlerCallback
    This is a callback interface to RuleManager which is used by the TriggerHandler to notify the RuleManager about firing of the Trigger.
  • Classes in org.openhab.core.automation.handler used by org.openhab.core.automation.thingsupport 
    Class Description
    BaseModuleHandlerFactory
    This class provides a ModuleHandlerFactory base implementation.
    ModuleHandler
    A common interface for all module Handler interfaces.
    ModuleHandlerFactory
    This interface represents a factory for ModuleHandler instances.
